title: Kombi Bus 1971, originally restored, split window - https://www.facebook.com/brasilianvwforsale/

posts.content:
Completely Original restored, with owners manual Bus split Window, 1500 air cooled engine, standard model(very rare, as they were mostly used for services). Price £$23.000,00(Twenty three thousand english pounds). Contacts: (00-55-15-98833-1956), São Paulo, Brazil), pjmf10@hotmail.com
I have many photos of the car, ask for them, because I don't know how to put them in this text, I have even tried, but did not have success.
many photos of the bus in facebook: https://www.facebook.com/brasilianvwforsale/
Paulo José Meyer Ferreira
